resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/156603</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>156603</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2588</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The influence of gravitational forces on the movement of celestial bodies</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Einfluß der Gravitationskräfte auf die 
Bewegung der Himmelskörper</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'influence des forces de la gravité sur le 
mouvement des corps célestes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A influência de forças gravitacionais no 
movimento de corpos celestiais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'influenza delle forze gravitazionali sul 
movimento dei corpi celesti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η επιρροή των βαρύτητας δυνάμεων στη μετακίνηση των 
ουράνιων οργανισμών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La influencia de fuerzas gravitacionales en el 
movimiento de cuerpos celestes</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A simulation of Newtons Law of Universal gravitation as applied to orbital motion of celestial bodies and trajectories of rockets.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">force of gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">planets</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Simulation des Newton-Gesetzes der 
Universalgravitation in Bezug auf Augenhöhlenbewegung der 
Himmelskörper und Flugbahn der Raketen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une simulation de loi de newton d'attraction 
universelle universelle pour le mouvement orbital des corps célestes 
et la trajectoire des fusées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma simulação da lei dos newtons da gravitação
universal para o movimento orbital de corpos celestiais e o 
trajectories dos foguetes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una simulazione di legge di Newton di gravitazione
universale per movimento orbitale dei corpi celesti e la traiettoria 
dei razzi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια προσομοίωση του νόμου Newtons της καθολικής 
βαρύτητας όπως εφαρμόζεται στην τροχιακή κίνηση των ουράνιων 
οργανισμών και των τροχιών των πυραύλων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una simulación de la ley de los neutonios de la 
gravitación universal en relación al movimiento orbital de cuerpos 
celestes y a la trayectoria de cohetes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft von Schwerkraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Planeten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force de la pesanteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">planètes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força da gravidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planetas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza di gravità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pianeti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δύναμη της βαρύτητας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πλανήτες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuerza de la gravedad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">planetas</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>

            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>

        </lifeCycle>

        <educational>

          </learningResourceType>
          <typicalAgeRange>

          <context>

        <classification>
